channel.title: CVE Feed for Elastic -- Elastic Cloud on Kubernetes
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Elastic -- Elastic Cloud on Kubernetes

item.title: CVE-2023-31416|2024-08-02T14:53:30.908Z -- elastic -- elastic%20cloud%20on%20kubernetes
item.description: Secret token configuration is never applied when using ECK <2.8 with APM Server >=8.0. This could lead to anonymous requests to an APM Server being accepted and the data ingested into this APM deployment.
